page.title: 09Shopping
page.content: Here there are no shops.Most people go to Cupar for everyday shopping such as food but most people go to Dundee to buy clothing and large purchases. We have a paper-man who delivers a daily courier from the printing works in Dundee.The milkmen from Kilrenny and Kingskettle deliver fresh milk everyday except Saturday.Other vans that deliver weekly are the ice-cream van from Glenrothes,the fish van from St.Monans,the lemonade van from Dundee and the baker's van from Gauldry.All these vans go Kilmany and Rathillet but few go to the farms .Once a fortnight the coal man from Dundee comes.Because of this type of shopping most people own a car.But there are no petrol stations or garages where they can buy fuel.
